name: Head Center
description: The Head Center is the pressure center for mental inspiration and questions. It creates the pressure to answer questions and seek knowledge.

when_defined.characteristic: Consistent mental pressure and fixed way of being inspired
when_defined.strength: Reliable source of inspiration and questions
when_defined.challenge: Can be mentally pressured even when rest is needed
when_defined.guidance: Trust your unique way of processing inspiration

when_undefined.characteristic: Variable mental pressure, takes in questions from others
when_undefined.strength: Flexible thinking, can see many perspectives
when_undefined.challenge: Can feel overwhelmed by others' mental pressure
when_undefined.not_self: Trying to answer everyone's questions, mental overwhelm
when_undefined.guidance: Learn to let go of questions that aren't yours

stress_protocol.undefined: Release mental pressure through meditation or nature
